snippet: The Pentagon on Friday stressed that about three dozen Special Operations troops would serve in an “advise and assist” capacity....
lead_paragraph: The Pentagon on Friday stressed that about three dozen Special Operations troops would serve in an “advise and assist” capacity.

headline.main: U.S. Special Operations Forces Arrive in Syria to Advise Turks in ISIS Fight
headline.print_headline: Special Forces to Aid Turks Fighting ISIS in North Syria
